wikipedia.title: Smoke Some Kill
wikipedia.extract: Smoke Some Kill is the third album by rapper Schoolly D.  The album was released in 1988 for Jive Records and was produced by Schoolly D.

opinions.details: 出自《The Signifying Monkey》这本书，所以翻译沿用中文版书的标题：意指
The teasing, taunting, and insulting tradition within African American culture is referred to as “signifyin’”
